JavaBooks

Class Library

  • java.lang.Object
    • JavaBooks.Library

  • public final class Library
extends java.lang.Object
    Definisce una libreria (Library) come una raccolta (DefaultListModel) di libri (Book)
    Author:
    Simone Bisi
    See Also:
    DefaultListModel, Book
